name: File Organizer
title: File Organizer
description: Organizes files in a folder by extension.
longDescription: This script will organize the files in a directory/folder into subfolders based on extension/type of file (e.g. images, documents, videos, music, productivity files, source code, archives, executables, etc.)
author: BOGO

parameters.name: folder-path
parameters.label: Folder to organize:
parameters.description: Select the folder containing files to be organized by extension
